Amazing

A great game made before its time. A lot of ingenuity and sets the pace for vast storyline single player FPS.

Se, come me, avete adorato i primi 2 episodi (e non vedo il motivo perchè non avreste dovuto) farete la stessa cosa anche con questo. Non mi addentro nella storia, gameplay o altre faccende tecniche...dico soltanto che sono state le 33 ore più immersive, coinvolgenti, folli ed indimenticabili ore che abbia passato su un gioco della mia libreria. Forse un pò troppo pazze anche per il sottoscritto! Voto 10

My favorite Bioshock title by far.  Great fluid mechanics, gripping story, unique setting.  I Loved everything about this game.

10/10

[h1] «Разум субъекта предпринимает отчаянную попытку создать воспоминания там, где их нет…»  — Р. Лютэс


«Bioshock Infinite» — третья  игра из серии «Bioshock», но сюжетом она не сильно связана с прошлыми частями, и вы смело можете начинать знакомство с Вселенной Bioshock’а с Infinite.

Такой глубокой и увлекательной истории, которую нам рассказывает игра, в индустрии не было.
Сценарий BioShock Infinite поначалу кажется в меру банальным и не слишком выдающимся —  Букер Девитт отправляется в летающий город Колумбию, чтобы найти и вернуть на землю некую загадочную девушку Элизабет. Но  сюжет оказывается сложной загадкой и ключ от которой дают только в  конце. Сюжет прекрасен всеми самыми удачными фишками научно-популярного жанра. Здесь найдется место и параллельным вселенным, и квантовым парадоксам, и путешествиям во времени.


Ничто в Infinite не болтается никому не нужным и  не вызывает раздражения или скуки. «Прокачке» подлежит все: как оружие и способности Девитта, так и его постоянные характеристики — максимальный уровень здоровья, щита и запаса соли. Помимо этого, Букер может надеть на себя одновременно четыре предмета одежды, которые дают ему различные бонусы.

— Я вижу… орла.
— А я — решку.
— Здесь всё дело в плоскости.
— Что ты видишь с этого угла? Жив.
— А с этого? Мёртв.
— Та же монета.
— Но другая плоскость.
— Орёл.
— Решка.
— Мёртв.
— Жив.

Плюсы:
- Великолепный сюжет и история, достойные фильма или книги.
- Шикарная атмосфера, которая привлекает ещё с начала игры.
- Превосходный дизайн, очень красивая графика.
- Концовка. Она расставляет всё на места,когда в другое время может сломать мозг
- Невероятно детальный, проработанный и красивый мир, где уделено внимание разработчиков к каждой детали.
- Элизабет. Это один из лучших персонажей и напарников
Минусы:
- Их нет



Эта игра оставила мне столько позитивных эмоций,что как и Ведьмак 3 я ее  не забуду!

10 из 10 [/h1]

Note: I played this game on Linux.

This is the gold standard by which I judge all other video games so far.  Amazing graphics, excellent music, totally immersive world...  All game developers need to play this game as a core requirement of their field.  The only fault is that they set the bar too high for anyone else!

我觉得bioshock在我看来是属于那种“卧槽我居然还没有玩过的”游戏系列里面的...反正画风也好操作也好都让我有种在玩德军总部的感觉...但感觉又比德军总部来的舒畅...反正我认为游戏体验比德军总部好一点...（可能是题材的个人偏好吧），然后就是...哎好多地方还是没玩明白但我算是知道了一件事了：














战斗中不会死又会定期（经常）给你送钱给你送蓝瓶送红瓶送子弹的女神女主加上动不动就跑动不动就和男主分开-和好-分开-和好玩暧昧，这种女主简直我就说除了在宅男梦里和这里也没谁了





恩游戏通关了自己来补一下感受，这是我近五年来给我感触最深刻的单机了恐怕（上一次还是仙剑系列）我错了女主其实是女儿（瞧你们想到哪里去了）整一个游戏可能在第一次玩的时候会有些不解甚至感觉剧情奇怪，可绝对是有理有据最后能"自圆其说"的，平行宇宙的知识可能有点远但我觉得高中课就有说过吧..恩最后的一扇扇门可能开得有点云里雾里（汉化了的话可能好些），哎

每一次打通关都感觉自己失去了一个好朋友
像这样的好游戏真的不多了
迷幻的剧情，但是不得不说故事性还挺强的。但是吧，我觉得想看无脑割草党的还是别入了。。。

I was absolutely amazed by this game , nice graphics and cool weapons, best bioshock so far, by far. The twist at the end was something extra, I am going to play this storymode again soon. 

I can strongly recommend this game.

玩第一部的时候我想的是：气氛太压抑了，游戏流程太长了，这倒霉游戏什么时候才能打完啊！！！
玩这一部的时候想的是：哥伦比亚城太漂亮了，伊丽莎白太贴心了，为什么游戏流程这么短！不要结束啊！我要一直陪着伊丽莎白！！！
惊艳的美术风格，出色的剧情
С пивом потянт
Breathtaking in a word.  A masterpiece. Just wow.

I haven't always been the biggest fan of the Bioshock franchise but I really wanted to try this one out because the atmosphere of a floating city really lured me in. Elizabeth was a dark delight and Troy Baker's voicing of Booker was enjoyable. The gunplay in this game felt a little on the lazy side but was overall acceptable.

There was one thing that truly annoyed me with this game that seems to have been around since 2013. There's an absolutely HORRIBLE memory leak. Playing with the graphics on Ultra caused all 16GB of my RAM to be used and when the game client was shut down, it would not release the memory back into the pool. I had to force a system restart in order to clear it up.

Should you play this game? Yes.

Be warned though, you'll have to deal with the memory leak.

Playing Bioshock Infinite was a eye opening experience, I never really get to involved with a game but this really brought me in,Not only was the story amazing but the gameplay such as Gun fights were just incredible the only fault for the game is that it couldnt last forever, if your looking for a game to give you the feels and just want to enjoy every second of a game welp Bioshock Infinate is for you.

Великолепная игра!
Интересный и захватывающий сюжет, приятная картинка, можно прокачивать пушки и способности, оптимизация, атмосфера.
Стоит своих денег и объязательна к прохождению!

Uma obra de arte, o jogo te suga com sua historia magnifica, e gameplay muito divertido, e possui um dos ou se não até o melhor final que eu já vi na minha vida, fiquei de boca aberta os creditos inteiro pensando naquele ultimo momento do jogo. (PS tem cena pós creditos!)
Excellent game - beautiful graphics, amazing realisation of the imagined world, and the gameplay is satisfying even for an awful FPS player like me.

Не смотря на то, что игра вышла относительно давно и до сих пор ждала своего часа (увы уделить время ей я решил только после того, как узнал о существовании фанатской озвучки от CGInfo),  игра из тех, которые по-умолчанию должны быть пройдены абсолютно всеми. 强烈推荐。

10/10

[h1] Переоценённый шутер с псевдоглубоким сюжетом [/h1]

[i]Предисловие[/i]
Спустя 3,5 года я наконец-то решил поиграть в "Лучшую игру десятилетия".
Настрой был весьма оптимистичен, ведь отзывы в Стиме и на Метакритике ясно давали понять, что предо мною не просто очередной рельсовый шутер. И действительно, в первые 1,5 часа может сложится очень хорошее впечатление касательно данного продукта. Но чем дальше, тем хуже, и к 3-4 часу игра превращается в сущий ад. 
Но давайте по порядку.

[i]Посмотрим на шутерную часть:[/i]

[h1]Стреляй в тупых ботов снова и снова [/h1]
Игра не зря имеет в название слово "infinite" ибо бесконечный тир и полное отсутствие разнообразия это всё что здесь есть. Стрельба тут до ужаса убогая и скучная, как впрочем и всё в этой "игре". Последние 2 часа пребывания в этом никчёмном шутер я просто мечтал чтобы эта пытка закончилась, но она всё продолжалась и продолжалась...
Шутер из [i]Bioshock infinite[/i] просто никакой. 

[i]А что ещё тут есть кроме стрельбы?[/i]

[h1] Ах да, сюжет... [/h1]
Именно его вспоминают при виде названия [i]Bioshock infinite[/i]. Он здесь построен на теории мультивселенной, теории очевидно настолько сложной, что разработчики сами её не поняли, оттуда и все разговоры о "Сверхглубоком сюжете".
Во время игры то и дело задаёшься вопросами "Как?", "Зачем?", "Почему?", большинство из них не получит ответа даже после полного прохождения.

[h1] Итог [/h1]
В общем у нас есть очень скучный шутер, рядом с которым даже колда не так ужасна. 
Вердикт: деньги и время на ветер.
Оценка: 3 переоценённых мешка с мусором из 10.


[spoiler] Отдельно стоит отметить в край отбитую фан-базу этого творения, члены которой даже по прошествии 6-ти лет, подобно монахам, молятся на этот кусок каловых масс и закидывают камнями любой обзор где предмет их поклонения подвергается критики со стороны адекватных игроков. Этот обзор не исключение. [/spoiler]

Would you kindly.....wait for a steam sale and purchase everything for this game?  Seriously though, I played this game years ago and never got a chance to play the DLC, but thank god for steam sales.  Nothing can truly replace the magic of the original Bioshock, but the story for infinite is up there with so many great classics.  Save this to your wishlist and buy this game with all DLC the moment there is a price drop, you will not be disappointed.
Great fun.  A bit different from the first Bioshock's, but enjoyed the experience.  Would buy and play again.

我在玩这款游戏时一直在想它究竟是游戏还是一件艺术品，我第一次玩的是盗版的，我当时就被里面的天空之城所震撼了，现在是我第二遍玩了，剧情很棒，丰富的武器，给力的队友，这款游戏就一个字：赞！

BioShock es una de mis sagas favoritas y con este juego terminó de ganarse mi corazón. Las historias que cuentan son profundas y encantadoras, los entornos son especiales y, en cierto sentido para mi, hermosos. Amo más Rapture que Columbia, sin embargo la calidad de ambas me es digna de admirar (más después de la remasterización de los dos primeros juegos). Sus dlc "Burial at sea" es del mismo nivel que el juego base, dejando esa sensación extraña pero divina que se obtiene con los otros juegos.
Si nada de eso convence, solo puedo decir: would you kindly play it?
this game was worth every secod i put in such a good game very good storie if you get it

Sem dúvida, esse jogo é EXCELENTE! Melhor jogo que eu já joguei em toda a minha vida!

Pode não ter o terror e a consequência de escolhas como nos dois primeiros jogos, mas isso tudo é compensado pois a história e o roteiro desse jogo, assim como o plot twist do final é algo tão bem trabalho e tão bem escrito que essas coisas se tornam até irrelevantes no final, pois tudo vale á pena! Não via um enredo tão complexo e bem construído assim em jogos havia muito tempo!

Além disso, não é só a história que deixa o jogo bom. A ambientação é uma das melhores que eu já vi, e a jogabilidade é muito boa e fluída.

Os personagens são todos muito bem construídos. A relação entre Booker e Elizabeth – a qual é a personagem mais bem construída do jogo – é algo de tirar o chapéu! Não tem forçåção de barra, ela é natural, bem feita, parece que de fato eles são humanos conversando normalmente, os diálogos entre eles são muito bem elaborados, isso faz com que você goste ainda mais do jogo do que o normal!
물줄기 번개 샷건 먹음 무슨난이도건 개좃밥으로 클리어가능
Very good story that might make your head hurt a little, to where once you figure it all out it is very rewarding.

The best Bioshock game EVER!!!
Irrational games really did it. The story is amazing. Between Booker & Elizabeth. A bond that can't  be broken. No matter what.

Burial Under The Sea DLC is an amazing side store that takes you back to the underwater utopia that is Rapture. Back to the golden era of Rapture to find a little girl who is lost and statt  the series of events that are in Bioshock.

NOTA 10 !
O jogo tem uma das narrativas mais incríveis que joguei até hoje! A ligação entre Rapture e Columbia é sutil e majestosa. Sem falar do lance das fendas, é sensacional. Não vou soltar spoilers, mas quem já finalizou e procurou entender melhor a história, sabe perfeitamente que esse é um jogo que vale a pena jogar de novo.

Incredible. Just flat out incredible. The story is so smart and immersive, and it does a damn good job of getting you attached to Elizabeth. There isn't much more to say, other than the fact that if you don't have this game, you need to get it.

Played the other 2 games before this one and i can say that i dislike this one so much , i still can't believe myself.
The overall dumbing down of gameplay mechanics in Infinite took away a lot of the freedoms and intricacies of combat. Only 2 weapons, no alternate ammo, no unique or visual weapon upgrades, barely any environmental interactivity (like oil spills, pools of water, barrels, etc) and not much choice in passive upgrades like Tonics, just forgettable hats and other minor gear upgrades.
2-3 Handymen in the entire game, and no Little Sister mechanic just made them another dull enemy to fight. Just a splicer with more health, whereas the Big Daddy was passive until attacked, used mines, and had other abilites (like stomping / turret-throwing). Every Big Daddy felt like a mini boss, and was a challenge / joy to fight, and required a bit of strategy with laying traps and such.
Even hacking is absent, which, I agree was not the most fun 'minigame', but it was rewarding for hacking doors, vendors, turrets, etc. It added another element of freedom. The ADAM upgrades were also a nice reward, while we now just find 'Vigors' lying around at pre-determined parts of the game.
And many other things that i won't bother to write.
An MEH game, but I still find BIO1/2 vastly superior in terms of replayability and gameplay / level design.

Nice Game..

A nice glittering breath of fresh air and vitamin D after such a long submersion into Rapture. 

Storyline-wise, you don't really NEED to have played the previous games to enjoy this one- it's a stand-alone prequel. Sort of. Mostly. Play the game, then have a fun discussion about the physics of time and reality and their relationship between this and the previous games with your friends! Anywho, I don't believe I encountered anything that really crosses into the first two games until way late in the game, or until you play the expansion side-stories. But why cheat yourself? Even the second Bioshock was enjoyable to me just for the continued story and extended Rapture romp. 

Game-wise, this is still a smooth and enjoyable FPS series. The NPC companion addition to this game was WAY more helpful and less obnoxious than other shooters without taking away from the gameplay- I was actually missing my adorable, moody Elizabeth when she wasn't there. I can't wait to see where the series goes next now that it's open to, more or less, infinate possibilities!

I do still miss my little bees, though...

Bioshock and I have a strange relationship. I absolutely loathe the gameplay with a passion, but the story, setting, and theme keeps me playing regardless. Infinite is no different. But it wisely avoids the ridiculous counter-productive plottwists of Bioshock 1 that ended up making no sense and souring me on the entire story as a whole.

This though, this is perfection. A perfect blend of a mindboggling story, wonderful characters, fantastic acting, and picturesque graphics and sound. But then you play the game and most of your interactions are just shooting bullet sponge enemies until they eventually die, murdering your way through hundreds of people in a psychopathic murder spree until once again you get a part of the wonderful story. Now I'm not going to say this game shouldn't be a shooter, certainly a walking-simulator version would be just as dull.. but boy do I wish they'd making the shooting more fun... especially since you fight oh so many enemies with weapons and abilities that do oh so very little.

I find myself wishing I'd played the game on the easiest difficulty just so I could have skipped over what ought to be the meat of the game as quickly as possible.

Perhaps I'm in the minority over the gameplay, but there's still a fantastic experience in here, it is just under a very tedious bloodbath.
JUST BUY IT 10/10 good gameplay and story worth your hard earned money

This is just a master piece, buy it right know, the only downside is that you would want to play more.

'Bring us the girl - wipe away your debt' is the premise. [p] Forunately it is not that easy. You get engulfed in an adventure with extitement, emotions, and FTS action with shooting and vioence. You'll get some magic "vigors" to bash your enemies with, but you can also shoot them with guns. 
The plot seems normal at first, but gets weird, inspided by some quantum mechanics theories. But what to expect from a theocracy floating in the sky?
You get to hang out with the girl, but the relationship is very complicated. 

Anyway It's a fantastic game. If you like an FPS with a story, you'll like this. 

Linux users: there is a bug that still seems unfixed, that causes freezes on some systems. Workaround: add "taskset -c 1,3,5,7 %command%" to launch options. Set CPU to max with "sudo cpupower frequency-set -g performance" or with some applet or program that does it.
Is gud.

Okay, at the start you think "Okay, just another FPS", but at the end of the first quarter of the game you are already thinking "Maybe not my usual FPS...". And in the ending, you remeber that this is a Bioshock game, and everything you had in mind for the ending is now completely different.

Great game in general. but the story for me is by far the best part.
I haven't play previous bioshock. But trust me, your standard of high quality game will be raised after played this game.
Hyvä peli!
Amazing game with a mind-blowing story! :O 10/10

Just completed/beat the game (including the Dlc's)  last week...I really love the game...I fell in love with the game and i think most of you will too...This is not a game but A MASTERPICE.Thank you 2K and Irrational Games for creating an amazing game but sadly Irrational Games shut down :( .I really do recommend the game.You'll not gonna regret buying it.So the game has a lot of pros:


-PROS
      
     -Beautiful Graphics (Unreal Engine)
     -Amazing original storyline (last part will probably make you cry)
     -Amazing Characters (Booker Dewitt and Elizabeth)
     -The combats are fresh and invigerating
     -Dlc's
     -uhm...Constant and variables?
     -MUCH MUCH MORE!!!

 -CONS

     -Sorry,This game has no Cons at all..cause the game is a perfect masterpice

I played this game through once, when it was released. To this day, I still maintain that it has the best storyline I have ever had the pleasure to witness. I may put my hours into Civ and Rocket League, but I remember Bioshock Infinite.

Really enjoyed this game!
If your a fan of the BioShock Serious you will mostly likely love this game.

Pros:
Runs great and smooth.
Beautiful art style.
Lots of guns.
Quantum physics sci-fy theme is awesome!
Your companion is the opposite of a gold digger!!! she throws money at you just for being cool!

Cons:
I didn't like the powers in this bioShock, it was like there was too many, which made it complicated to switch to them and cycle all of them in a firefight.
Replayability for me is kinda of low because once you play through once you'll wanna go back and choose diffrent things...but those chosices don't really change the game...so kinda linear i guess. Would of been nice to have those small changes affect the entire outcome.

All in all very fun, glad i tried this one out! The Quantum Physics BLEW MY MIND!!!!

我需要好好的给这款作品评测一下，它给我的印象太深刻了

      我一开始只是把它当作比较猎奇的游戏来体验的，但是渐渐的我发现这游戏越来越吸引人，伊丽莎白起初对布克抱有敌意，到后来与布克成为正真的朋友，对于伊丽莎白来说，她的童年是在高塔里度过的，她对于朋友的概念非常的重要，布克起初给我的感觉就是，一个为了利益不择手段的混蛋。但是后来他的举动，比如在酒吧地下室，布克拿起了一个吉他在弹奏，伊丽莎白在唱歌，这种情景多少让我有一点触动。               伊丽莎白真的是一个天使     [spoiler] 还有伊丽莎白在音乐的伴奏下忘我的跳舞，我都不忍心拉她QWQ	[/spoiler]
      我强烈你们入海葬DLC，它是补充生化奇兵的一个剧情，作为刚刚接触生化奇兵的玩家来说，也可以入手。因为你可以接触到生化奇兵的标志性敌人：大老爹。大老爹神了
     不过以下，就有点剧透了
   
     首先，海葬首部曲我一开始真没想到，用的是康姆斯托克，虽然康姆斯托克就是布克，但海葬中的康姆斯托克其实选择了逃避了哥伦比亚，逃避了一切现实，伊丽莎白来到销魂城就是为了解决康姆斯托克。[spoiler] 很难想像，伊丽莎白跟康姆斯托克跳舞时，表情可以这么镇定	[/spoiler]
     其次，如果你真的没有资金能力，可以只买二部曲，二部曲的主人公是伊丽莎白，并且二部曲强调潜入和解密 。没错，伊丽莎白还是有开锁工具。伊丽莎白实在不适合战斗，海葬允许带的子弹就少的可怜，伊丽莎白本身又不适合战斗，所以。。。
     二部曲里的潜入真的是太难了，伊丽莎白本身穿的是高跟鞋，所以一定要蹲着走，踩水里会导致声音巨响，踩玻璃碎片也是。虽然首部曲康姆斯托克是解决掉大老爹了，但是在二部曲里，伊丽莎白完全无法打死大老爹。[spoiler]啊？为什么我这么清楚，我试过了	[/spoiler]
     二部曲一开始让我特别惊叹，不是用伊丽莎白吗？那不就可以使用裂变了吗？然而，在首部曲结尾，康姆斯托克没把大老爹杀彻底，导致大老爹趁机杀了康姆斯托克，在这一过程中，伊丽莎白也难逃一劫。当伊丽莎白企图打开空气阀门时，她发现了自己的尸体，这段我实在没搞懂，不管怎么样，活着的伊丽莎白的小拇指回来了，而且她失去了裂变能力。并且，她连护盾都没有。”我现在只是一个有一大堆书本知识，和一大堆开锁器的普通女孩“官方自槽。不过，伊丽莎白的心中有布克的声音，其实那本身是伊丽莎白自己的意识。
     二部曲一开始，伊丽莎白漫步巴黎街道很美，真的很美。副BGM：《La Vie En Rose》
  啊？为什么我不在DLC评测海葬，我当然知道你们都不会去看DLC的评测。。
    [spoiler]祝伊丽莎白永远快乐，愿伊丽莎白永远不要再来到销魂城	[/spoiler]
   

   好梦，伊丽莎白
